checkin_prompt_text: ğŸŒ A fresh new day! Banmao team, let's check in! Tap "Check in" or use /checkin to confirm you're present and ready!

ğŸŒ Daily check-in reminder:
â€¢ Tap the group's "Check in" button or use /checkin to start today's challenge.
â€¢ Have your Xlayer wallet ready so your attendance earns the configured points.
â€¢ Answer the math check to prove you're human!

admin_command_list_title: ğŸ› ï¸ Admin commands for this group
admin_command_admin_header: â€¢ /admin â€” parent hub for moderation & bot controls:

admin_command_admin_hint: /admin is the parent menu. Use the buttons to open or preview each control.
admin_cmd_desc_checkinadmin: Check-in admin hub with schedules, XP, and broadcasts.
admin_cmd_desc_mute: Mute a member for a specific time.
admin_cmd_desc_warn: Record a warning with an optional reason.
admin_cmd_desc_warnings: Show the warning history for a member.
admin_cmd_desc_purge: Bulk delete a number of recent messages.
admin_cmd_desc_add_blacklist: Add a banned keyword for auto-deletion.
admin_cmd_desc_remove_blacklist: Remove a keyword from the blacklist.
admin_cmd_desc_status: Show the bot status and toggles in this group.
admin_cmd_desc_set_xp_react: Enable or disable XP gained from reactions.
admin_cmd_desc_whale: Enable or disable whale transaction alerts.
admin_cmd_desc_draw: Pick a giveaway winner with prize and rules.
admin_cmd_desc_review_memes: List memes that are waiting for approval.
admin_cmd_desc_approve: Approve a pending meme by ID.
admin_cmd_desc_reject: Reject a pending meme by ID.
admin_cmd_desc_track: Track or update a project wallet address.
